name: Peanut Butter Protein Waffles
instructions: Preheat your waffle iron according to the manufacturer's instructions.
In a large bowl, combine the whole wheat flour, protein powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the almond milk, Greek yogurt, egg, peanut butter, and vanilla extract until smooth.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined; do not overmix.
Lightly coat the waffle iron with cooking spray or oil.
Pour a portion of the batter into the preheated waffle iron and cook until the waffle is golden brown and cooked through.
Serve the waffles warm, optionally topped with additional peanut butter and fresh fruit.
description: These Peanut Butter Protein Waffles are a delicious and nutritious way to start your day. Packed with protein powder and Greek yogurt, they're perfect for muscle repair and growth. The added peanut butter gives a nutty flavor that pairs perfectly with your favorite toppings.
additional_notes: For an extra boost of protein, add a handful of nuts or seeds to the batter.
These waffles can be made in advance and frozen for a quick breakfast option during the week.
